entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -24.1°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 103.9 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
